medical_history.chief_complaint: Elbow pain and decreased range of motion with considerable swelling over the olecranon.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented with a one-month history of elbow pain and decreased range of motion. The symptoms progressed from post-operative effects to significant swelling and limitation of motion.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Complex intra-articular fracture of the distal part of the right humerus, ipsilateral displaced distal radial fracture, distal humeral nonunion, and Coonrad-Morrey elbow replacement.
